Name: Age of Exploration
Scoring: Each Colossus gains one gold for each space that contains their Acolytes (regardless of control).

Name: Age of Patience
Scoring: Each Colossus gains one gold for each card in their hand.

Name: Age of Innovation
Setup: Search the deck for the Volcano and the Mountaintop of the Giants, the player with the Mantle places them on any spaces they choose. Re-shuffle the tile deck.
Scoring: The player who controls the Bountiful Beast's space gains 5 Gold.

Name: Gilded Age
Setup: Search the tile deck for the Deep Mines and The Brink. The player with the Mantle places them on any spaces they choose. Re-shuffle the tile deck.
Scoring: If any player controls no spaces that contain Gold cubes, they gain 8 gold.

Name: Age of Solitude
Scoring: If any Colossus has no Acolytes (including their own Acolytes) on or adjacent to their space, they gain 6 Gold.

Name: Age of Survival
Scoring: Each Colossus gains 1 Gold for each Acolyte they have on the board.

Name: Age of Paradox
Scoring: Any player may choose to skip the entire Reap phase of this Age. If they do, they gain 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Beasts
Scoring: For each space you control that is occupied by a Beast, or adjacent to one or more Beasts, gain 2 Gold.

Name: Age of Dominion
Scoring: Each player gains 2 gold for each space they control.

Name: Age of Consolidation
Setup: Place 3 Gold cubes on each space with a Colossus on it.
Scoring: Each Colossus gains 3 gold for each space they control adjacent to their space.

Name: Age of New Growth
Setup: Discard any tile that has a Gold Loot reward. If there were Acolytes or Colossi on those spaces, immediately draw new tiles to replace them. Empty spaces can be re-explored.
Scoring: Each player gains 5 gold for each space they control that has a Gold Loot reward.

Name: Age of Storms
Setup: Discard every tile that is adjacent to water. If there are Acolytes or Colossi on those spaces, immediately draw new tiles to replace them. Empty spaces can be re-explored.
Scoring: Each player gains 1 Gold for each Acolyte they have adjacent to water.

Name: Age of Diplomacy
Scoring: Each player gains 3 gold for each Acolyte they have in a space they don't control.

Name: Age of Authority
Scoring: Each player gains 3 gold for each opposing Acolyte in their Colossus's space.

Name: Age of Prosperity
Setup: Gather 12 Gold cubes from the bank. Divide them evenly among the players. Beginning with the player with the Mantle, take turns placing 1 Gold cube on any space on the board.
Scoring: If any player controls no spaces that contain Gold cubes, they gain 12 gold.

Name: Age of Comradery
Setup: Beginning with the player with the Mantle, each player may move their Colossus to any space they choose.
Scoring: If any Colossus is on a space with another Colossus, they gain 8 Gold.

Name: Age of Connection
Setup: Beginning with the player with the Mantle, each player may place all the Acolytes from the hand on any spaces they choose.
Scoring: The player with the most spaces connected to their Colossus via Acolyte roads gains 10 Gold.
